wikipedia_page.main: Cecil Henry Wilson (8 September 1862 – 7 November 1945) was a British pacifist Labour Party Member of Parliament (MP).

The Sheffield Attercliffe by-election of 1944 was held on 21 February 1944.  The byelection was held due to the resignation  of the incumbent Labour MP, Cecil Wilson.  It was won by the unopposed Labour candidate John Hynd.
